BTF 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Run the modern (calibration) model

    run_modern.Rd

    Run the modern (calibration) model

    run_modern(
  modern_elevation = NULL,
  modern_species = NULL,
  dx = 0.4,
  ChainNums = seq(1, 3),
  n.iter = 40000,
  n.burnin = 10000,
  n.thin = 15,
  validation.run = FALSE,
  sigma_z_priors = NULL,
  fold = 1
)

    Arguments

    modern_elevation

    A dataframe of modern elevations

    modern_species

    A dataframe of modern counts (to be sorted with sort_modern)

    dx

    The elevation interval for spacing the spline knots. Defaults to 0.2.

    ChainNums

    The number of MCMC chains to run

    n.iter

    The number of iterations

    n.burnin

    The number of burnin samples

    n.thin

    The number of thinning

    validation.run

    Set to TRUE if running a validation

    sigma_z_priors

    provide priors for foram variability if available

    fold

    Fold number for CV

    Value

    Nothing is returned, the relevant data will be saved.

    Examples

    test_modern_mod <- run_modern(modern_elevation = NJ_modern_elevation,
                              modern_species = NJ_modern_species,
                              n.iter = 10,
                              n.burnin = 1,
                              n.thin = 1)
